code: import React from'react';import{Card,Badge,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ArchivedListCard=_ref=>{let{id,name,memberCount,itemCount,archivedDate,onRestore}=_ref;const formatDate=dateString=>{return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"archived-list-card h-100",style:{opacity:0.8},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{className:"d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between align-items-start mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{className:"mb-0 text-muted",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Badge,{bg:"secondary",children:"Archived"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Badge,{bg:"light",text:"dark",className:"me-2",children:["\uD83D\uDC65 ",memberCount," members"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Badge,{bg:"light",text:"dark",children:["\uD83D\uDCE6 ",itemCount," items"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-muted small mb-2",children:["Archived on: ",formatDate(archivedDate)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-success",className:"w-100",onClick:()=>{if(window.confirm("Restore \"".concat(name,"\"?"))){onRestore();}},children:"\u21BB Restore List"})]})]})});};export default ArchivedListCard;
